Plot: An investigative documentary about the epidemic of rape of soldiers within the US military.
Title: The Invisible War
Writer: Kirby Dick, Amy Ziering (additional writer), Douglas Blush (additional writer)
Actors: Amy Ziering, Kirby Dick, Kori Cioca, Jessica Hinves
tomatoConsensus: The Invisible War is a vital and frank expose on sexual assault in the U.S. military, shot by master filmmaker Kirby Dick (This Film is Not Yet Rated).
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 8 wins & 13 nominations.
